content:
76 
 
COOPERATIVE ECONOMICS AND  
MANAGEMENT  
UNIZIK   
  
  
  
  
  
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
chosen  from  
Mathematics, Economics 
and Business  
Management.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
including English  
Language, Mathematics, 
Economics plus any other 
two (2) subjects. For NBC  
Holders, the other 
subjects could be from 
the following: Principles  
Mathematics, 
Economics plus one  
(1) other subject.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  UNIZIK: candidates must satisfy the UTME  
requirements in addition to 'A' level passes in the 
specified subjects.  
  
  
UTME  
(i) UNIZIK accepts Mathematics, English Language and 
any other three (3) subjects  
 
COURSE/  
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
  of Accounts, Commerce, 
and Accounts.
